scripts.install-all: npm install --prefix server/react-server && npm install --prefix client/react-app
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix client/react-app && npm run build --prefix server/react-server
scripts.start: npm run build --prefix react-server && concurrently "npm run dev --prefix react-app" "npm run start --prefix react-server"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix server/react-server" "npm run dev --prefix client/react-app"
scripts.tsc:check: npm run tsc:check-app && npm run tsc:check-cypress
scripts.test:e2e: concurrently -k -s first "npm run dev:all" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && npm run cypress:run"
scripts.test:e2e:open: concurrently -k -s first "npm run dev:all" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && npm run cypress:open"
